definition: a newly grown bud (especially from a germinating seed), put forth and grow sprouts or shoots
details:
noun
- a newly grown bud (especially from a germinating seed)
- any new growth of a plant such as a new branch or a bud
verb
- put forth and grow sprouts or shoots
= example: put forth and grow sprouts or shoots
- produce buds, branches, or germinate
= example: produce buds, branches, or germinate
= synonyms: shoot
